channel.title: Interfaces
channel.description: Is there a way to make multiple interfaces 'walkable'? also, i have found a few ids that are just liek a button in the top right, is there a way to move the button, maybe use the elements i have found to make my own interface?

item.title: Interfaces
item.dc:creator: @dracar dracar
item.description:
@dracar wrote:

No i think its server side, you can use setInterfaceWalkable(id); to make it so you can walk on an interface, but like i have my server name at the top of the screen, and if i add weather, it makes my server name go away becuase idk how to make multiple interfaces appear on screen and make them walkable…

Read full topic

item.title: Interfaces
item.dc:creator: @EwfsPrince EwfsPrince
item.description:
@EwfsPrince wrote:

I think this bit is done on the client side unless I didn’t understand but it seems its a client problem. <_<

item.title: Interfaces

item.description:
@dracar wrote:

setInterfaceWalkable, can i make multiple walkable so i can have more things on screen…and i have found buttons and border interfaces, is there a way to move were the interface pops up at so i can make my own interfaces…
